#  Category: Catering & Bar Service

< PreviousNext >

## The Thirsty Filly

Serving Northeast Ohio

440-563-6225

Request Pricing Write A Review

Based in beautiful Ashtabula, we are Northeast Ohio’s premier mobile
bartending service. To house our rustic cocktail creations, along our journey,
we purchased vintage horse trailers and converted them into your hottest
bartending hotspot. Our goal was to emphasize the charm of wooden surfaces
with a flair of rustic décor. After we labored with love, we are excited to
introduce “The Thirsty Filly”. As 2023 brings new events, weddings, birthdays,
and celebrations, we are prepared to walk alongside you at your next memorable
moment.

Read More

Akron, Canton, Cleveland, North Canton, Youngstown, Ashtabula, Aurora, Chagrin
Falls, Cuyahoga Falls, Dover, Eastlake, Elyria, Euclid, Hudson, Independence,
Kent, Lorain, Massillon, Medina, Mentor, North Ridgeville, Parma, Ravenna,
Sandusky, Solon, Stow, Strongsville, Wadsworth, Warren, Willoughby, Wooster
and all of Northeast Ohio.
